fresh.body:
Hi Joe,

My name is Ben, and Iâ€™m an Analyst at Tegus by AlphaSense, a leading expert network and market intelligence platform.

{{goal}}

The goal is to schedule a 30-60 minute paid research call with my client.

If you're open to it, the next step is a brief 5-minute intro call to ensure it's a good fit. Our client is finalizing their schedule soon.

You can book a time that works for you directly on my calendar here: www.youcanbookme/benjamin.scheidelman.com

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

be_no_prior.body:
Hi Ben,

Thank you for being part of the AlphaSense network! We're excited to work with you as a valuable member of the Tegus by AlphaSense network, now among AlphaSense's offerings.

{{goal}} This is a paid consultation, and it won't require much of your time.

Do you have five minutes for a quick call so I can share the project details? Just let me know what number works best, or feel free to book a time on my calendar: www.youcanbookme/benjamin.scheidelman.com

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

be_prior.body:
Hi Ben,

Thank you for being a part of the Tegus by AlphaSense expert network!

My name is Ben, {{goal}} To get started, I just need your answers to these research questions:

  • Are you a customer of Twilio?
  • When did you last evaluate competitor solutions?
  • What is your role in the decision making process?

I have you down for an hourly rate of $300 per hour. Does that rate still work for you?

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben
